oai_dc:dc.dc:title: MSTParser
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: MSTParser is a non-projective dependency parser (see McDonald et al., 2005a, 2006) that searches for maximum spanning trees over directed graphs. Models of dependency structure are based on large-margin discriminative training methods (see McDonald et al., 2005b). Projective parsing is also supported (see McDonald et al., 2005a). For more details about this tool, see please http://www.seas.upenn.edu/~strctlrn/MSTParser/MSTParser.html.
